attributes.label: bottom
attributes.description: Property that defines the bottom position of the button (in px)

attributes.label: direction
attributes.description: Property that defines the direction of the scroll (for now only the "top" direction is available)

attributes.label: mode
attributes.description: Property that defines mode of the button (can be "light" or "dark")

attributes.label: right
attributes.description: Property that defines the right position of the button (in px)
